metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13139 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
In Docker before 18.09.4, an attacker who is capable of supplying ormanipulating the build path for the "docker build" command would be able togain command execution. An issue exists in the way "docker build" processesremote git URLs, and results in command injection into the underlying "gitclone" command, leading to code execution in the context of the userexecuting the "docker build" command. This occurs because git ref can bemisinterpreted as a flag.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13139` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 18.09.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.09.7').
